Text: List of liberal arts colleges:  The "Encyclopædia Britannica Concise" offers the following definition of the liberal arts as a, "college or university curriculum aimed at imparting general knowledge and developing general intellectual capacities, in contrast to a professional, vocational, or technical curriculum."

Text: List of liberal arts colleges:  Although the genesis for what is known today as the liberal arts college began in Europe, the term is commonly associated with the United States.
